    • Uses of Item in application

      Methods in application with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<RecommendedItem> Algorithm.similarItems(Item item, HashMap<Long,Item> otherItems)
      Returns a list of RecommendedItems based on similarity between items based on common qualities.
      Method parameters in application with type arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<RecommendedItem> Algorithm.highestRatedItems(HashMap<Long,Item> items)
      Returns a list of RecommendedItems based on average rating.
      ArrayList<RecommendedItem> Algorithm.recommendItems(User user, HashMap<Long,User> otherUsers, HashMap<Long,Item> items)
      Returns a list of RecommendedItems based on ratings given by similar users and if the user doesn't have enough ratings this will return a list of items sorted based on the average rating.
      ArrayList<RecommendedItem> Algorithm.similarItems(Item item, HashMap<Long,Item> otherItems)
      Returns a list of RecommendedItems based on similarity between items based on common qualities.
